comments.body:
Why go through all this trouble instead of

```
start = get_timestamp()
responses = run_commands(module, commands)
end = get_timestamp()
timestamps = (start, end)
```

'commands' argument is a list of commands, and i want run_commands to return timestamp of every commmand. So i have to make changes in run_commands function.
Your suggestion simplifies the code but can return only timestamps of command collection start and end.
Ah, yes, I see that now
